name: Kant
description: This course focuses on the thought of Immanuel Kant, making connections to some of Kants key predecessors such as Hume or Leibniz. The course will focus either on Kants metaphysics and epistemology, or his ethics, or his aesthetics.
prerequisites: Any 4.5 credits and [[PHLB33H3 or PHLB35H3] and additional 1.0 credit in PHL courses]
